entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 4 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the coast. Temperature falling to minus 4 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along the coast. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022
